room_title: Escape room "Apartment 460" by Locked 460 Escape Rooms in Grand Rapids
review: It was super fun. We got caught by the murderer, but we were so close. Just had the escape code to go.

room_title: Escape room "Apartment 460" by Locked 460 Escape Rooms in Grand Rapids
review: This was my first experience with an escape room. It was so much fun!We had 5 in our group and everyone worked together to solve the Apartment Escape. We were told that this was the hardest room to solve. Stevie was great and very helpful with our clues. We managed to escape with 5 minutes to spare!

room_title: Escape room "Apartment 460" by Locked 460 Escape Rooms in Grand Rapids
review: I've been to a half-dozen or so escape rooms, and I have a bit of an addiction. We did Apartment 460 and it was the best one I've done yet. Do yourself a favor and check it out!

room_title: Escape room "Apartment 460" by Locked 460 Escape Rooms in Grand Rapids
review: This was my first time I've done an escape room and it was awesome. My friends and I choose to try the hardest room available, Apartment 460, and we were not disappointed! Our game master was helpful but didn't hold our hand the whole time which allowed us to really use our detective skills. I would definitely suggest choosing Locked 460 if you desire a challenging but fun time!

room_title: Escape room "Apartment 460" by Locked 460 Escape Rooms in Grand Rapids
review: I love doing escape rooms and Locked 460 did not disappoint! We ended up doing 2 rooms and they were both fantastic. Wanted had a great western atmosphere and Apartment 460 had the right amount of suspense and creepiness. Thanks Stevie and the management for making our first experience at Locked 460 an awesome one! We will definitely be back to try Infiltrate!
